Name: Clover Club (Difford's recipe)
Ingredients: 10 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0Â°Brix)
15 ml Egg white (pasteurised) or 																																			Aquafaba (chickpea water)																								 or 3 dashes Fee Brothers Fee Foam cocktail foamer
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Prepare garnish of lemon zest twist and raspberry.
MUDDLE raspberries in base of shaker.
Add other ingredients, SHAKE with ice and strain back into shaker.
Express lemon zest twist over the cocktail and discard.
Garnish with raspberry floated in centre of cocktail.
Review: It's a bit of a faff to make, but it's worth the clogged sink drain from the raspberry shrapnel. Using raspberry syrup and especially raspberry jam in a Clover Club introduces cooked "jammy" notes, while this can be delicious (see Julie Reiner's Clover Club ), I like to retain and hero fresh berry flavours.
